title: Pfizer, BioNTech start testing COVID-19 vaccine in pregnant women
author: Julie Steenhuysen
description: Pfizer Inc and BioNTech SE have started an international study with 4,000 volunteers to evaluate the safety and effectiveness of their COVID-19 vaccine in healthy pregnant women, the companies said on Thursday.
